title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: Pearl Harbor Commemorations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Video Archive     Pearl Harbor Commemorations                Pearl Harbor Commemorations                         Interment of Joseph Langdell On December 7, 2015, the National Park Service and the U.S. Navy conducted the interment of Joseph Langdell, who was a young Ensign assigned to the USS Arizona. Full military burial honors were rendered to Ensign Langdell by the U.S. Navy  Duration:2 minutes, 24 seconds
